title: Contributions for unpaid leaves of absence
context: [ยง88-45.4] Contributions for unpaid leaves of absence. Contributions required as a condition to inclusion in membership service of unpaid leaves of absence shall be made by the member within one year after return from the leave of absence. [L 2015, c 86, ยง2] Revision Note Section was enacted as an addition to subpart A but was codified to this subpart pursuant to ยง23G-15.
